titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude social security benefits from gross income, and for other purposes.
No Tax on Social Security Act of 2021
No Tax on Social Security Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
No Tax on Social Security Act of 2021
This bill excludes from gross income, for income tax purposes, social security benefits (i.e., title II retirement benefits and railroad retirement benefits).
